name: Puzzle Solving - Block Game
description:
It is a game that helps you to train your mind in a fun way. In this game, you must place all the hexagonal pieces to create the shape that is required in each level. You can get clues by passing the levels and playing every day.
It is easy to play and fun for all ages.

Characteristics:

• Easy to learn but difficult to master.
• Puzzle of hexagonal blocks.
• Very colorful and fun game.
• +240 levels.
• 4 levels of difficulty: Beginner, Advanced, Master and Expert.
developers: Pocket School - Basic education to learn for adults & kids
